p1x p1y p1z p2x p2y p2z pt
q1x q1y q1z q2x q2y q2z qt
r1x r1y r1z r2x r2y r2z rt
sx sy sz

pvx = p2x - p1x
pvxt = pvx * pt
px = p1x + pvxt
pvy = p2y - p1y
pvyt = pvy * pt
py = p1y + pvyt
pvz = p2z - p1z
pvzt = pvz * pt
pz = p1z + pvzt

qvx = q2x - q1x
qvxt = qvx * qt
qx = q1x + qvxt
qvy = q2y - q1y
qvyt = qvy * qt
qy = q1y + qvyt
qvz = q2z - q1z
qvzt = qvz * qt
qz = q1z + qvzt

rvx = r2x - r1x
rvxt = rvx * rt
rx = r1x + rvxt
rvy = r2y - r1y
rvyt = rvy * rt
ry = r1y + rvyt
rvz = r2z - r1z
rvzt = rvz * rt
rz = r1z + rvzt

qx_px = qx - px
qy_py = qy - py
rx_px = rx - px
ry_py = ry - py
rz_pz = rz - pz
qz_pz = qz - pz
sx_px = sx - px
sy_py = sy - py
sz_pz = sz - pz
tmp_a = qx_px * ry_py
tmp_b = qy_py * rx_px
m01 = tmp_a - tmp_b
tmq_a = qx_px * rz_pz
tmq_b = qz_pz * rx_px
m02 = tmq_a - tmq_b
tmr_a = qy_py * rz_pz
tmr_b = qz_pz * ry_py
m12 = tmr_a - tmr_b
mt1 = m01 * sz_pz
mt2 = m02 * sy_py
mt3 = m12 * sx_px
mtt = mt1 - mt2
m012 = mtt + mt3
